S

SeaMonster - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class represents a Sea Monster as combat character It is a subclass of the Character class
SeaMonster() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
This is the no-arg constructor of the SeaMonster class It is chained to SeaMonster (int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
SeaMonster(int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
This is the parameterized constructor of the SeaMonster class it invokes the parameterized constructor of the superclass The constructor sets the values to those of the Sea Monster
seaMonsterHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
The instance variables represent the battle stats of the Sea Monster They are calculated via dice rolls from the BonusDiceBag class based on the character set guide seaMonsterHealth represents the current health of the Sea Monster seaMonsterMaxHealth represents the maximum health of the Sea Monster on creation seaMonsterStrength represents the combat strength attackChance represents a random number which is compared against to calculate the chances of a given attack being generated
seaMonsterMaxHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
 
seaMonsterStrength - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.SeaMonster
 
setActualDamage(int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the actual damage value for this AttackReport, no data validation is performed.
setCurrentHealth(int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Sets a new value for the current health of this character
setDamage(int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
Sets the damage score for this attack, no data validation is performed.
setMaxHealth(int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Sets the max Health value for this character, there is no data validation.
setReport(String) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the report for this object, does not perform any validation.
setStrength(int) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Sets the strength for this character, there is no data validation.
sides - Variable in enum com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.util.BonusDiceBag.Dice
 
strength - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Strength of the character as an integer value.
